queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm4011_s01 */ MEET_CD, -- 경주 구분 코드 STND_YEAR, -- 년도 TMS, -- 회차 DAY_ORD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(RACE_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RACE_DAY, RACE_YOIL, -- 요일 DECODE(RACE_YOIL,'MON','월','TUE','화','WED','수','THU','목','FRI','금','SAT','토','SUN','일') AS RACE_YOIL_KOR FROM VW_SDL_INFO -- 경주일 정보 WHERE 1=1 AND MEET_CD= ? -- 0:MEET_CD 구분코드 AND RACE_DAY = ? -- 1:RACE_DAY 경주일

SELECT /* rsm4011_s02 */ A.MEET_CD MEET_CD, -- 경륜 경정 구분 코드 A.POOL, -- 승식 코드 CASE WHEN A.POOL='001' THEN '단승식' WHEN A.POOL='002' THEN '연승식' WHEN A.POOL='004' THEN '쌍승식' WHEN A.POOL='005' THEN '복승식' WHEN A.POOL='006' THEN '삼복승식' WHEN A.POOL='007' THEN '삼쌍승식' --WHEN A.POOL='008' THEN '쌍복승식' ELSE '1. 매출액' END POOL_NM, -- 승식 설명 (NVL(A.POOL_TOTAL,0)+NVL(B.POOL_TOTAL,0)+NVL(C.POOL_TOTAL,0)) TOT, -- 전체 A.POOL_TOTAL PT_001, -- 운영본부 NVL(B.POOL_TOTAL,0) PT_002, -- 창원 C.POOL_TOTAL PT_004, -- 부산 D.PT_TOT PT_TOT_001, D.PT_TOT+D.PT_TOT_002+D.PT_TOT_004 PT_TOT, -- 전체누계 D.PT_TOT_002 PT_TOT_002, D.PT_TOT_004 PT_TOT_004 FROM ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, CASE WHEN P.POOL_CD='001' THEN '2' WHEN P.POOL_CD='002' THEN '3' WHEN P.POOL_CD='004' THEN '4' WHEN P.POOL_CD='005' THEN '5' WHEN P.POOL_CD='006' THEN '6' WHEN P.POOL_CD='007' THEN '7' --WHEN P.POOL_CD='008' THEN '8' ELSE '1' END ORD, DECODE(P.POOL_CD,NULL,'TOTAL',P.POOL_CD) POOL, SUM(P.NET_AMT) POOL_TOTAL FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 0:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 1:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD = V.MEET_CD AND P.SELL_CD IN('01','03') AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD, ROLLUP(P.POOL_CD) ORDER BY MEET_CD,POOL_CD ) A, ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, DECODE(P.POOL_CD,NULL,'TOTAL',P.POOL_CD) POOL, SUM(P.NET_AMT) POOL_TOTAL FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 2:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 3:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.SELL_CD ='02' AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD, ROLLUP(P.POOL_CD) ORDER BY MEET_CD,POOL_CD ) B, ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, DECODE(P.POOL_CD,NULL,'TOTAL',P.POOL_CD) POOL, SUM(P.NET_AMT) POOL_TOTAL FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 4:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 5:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.SELL_CD ='04' AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD, ROLLUP(P.POOL_CD) ) C, ( SELECT DECODE(P.POOL_CD,NULL,'TOTAL',P.POOL_CD) POOL, SUM( CASE WHEN P.SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.NET_AMT END ) PT_TOT, SUM( CASE WHEN P.MEET_CD = ? AND P.SELL_CD='02' THEN P.NET_AMT -- 6:MEET_CD ELSE 0 END ) PT_TOT_002, SUM( CASE WHEN P.MEET_CD = ? AND P.SELL_CD='04' THEN P.NET_AMT -- 7:MEET_CD ELSE 0 END ) PT_TOT_004 FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 8:MEET_CD '001' AND V.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 9:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 10:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY ROLLUP(P.POOL_CD)
) D WHERE B.POOL(+)=A.POOL AND C.POOL(+)=A.POOL AND D.POOL(+)=A.POOL ORDER BY A.ORD

WITH PC_GITA AS ( SELECT MEET_CD, SELL_CD, JIGEUP_DT, GITA1 COMMI_5, GITA2 COMMI_6 FROM VW_PC_GITA_CRS UNION ALL SELECT MEET_CD, SELL_CD, JIGEUP_DT, GITA1 COMMI_5, GITA2 COMMI_6 FROM TBJI_PC_GITA_CRS ) SELECT /* rsm4011_s03 */ LEV, MEET_CD, -- 경륜 경정 구분 코드 COMMI, -- 제세금 코드 COMMI_NM, -- 제세금 이름 DECODE(LEV,'1',SUM(C_TOT),SUM(C_TOT)) AS C_TOT, -- 전체 DECODE(LEV,'1',SUM(C_001),SUM(C_001)) AS C_001, -- 운영본부 DECODE(LEV,'1',SUM(C_002),SUM(C_002)) AS C_002, -- 창원 DECODE(LEV,'1',SUM(C_004),SUM(C_004)) AS C_004, -- 부산 DECODE(LEV,'1',SUM(C_YEAR_TOT),SUM(C_YEAR_TOT)) AS C_YEAR_TOT -- 전체누계 FROM ( SELECT C.LEV, MEET_CD, -- 경륜 경정 구분 코드 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',COMMI,'') COMMI, -- 제세금 코드 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',COMMI_NM,'2.제세금') COMMI_NM, -- 제세금 코드 C_TOT, C_001, C_002, C_004, C_YEAR_TOT FROM ( SELECT B.LEV, MEET_CD, -- 경륜 경정 구분 코드 DECODE(COMMI,NULL,'TOTAL',COMMI) COMMI, -- 제세금 코드 CASE WHEN COMMI='COMMI_1' THEN '수득금' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_2' THEN '경주세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_3' THEN '교육세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_4' THEN '농특세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_5' THEN '기타소득세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_6' THEN '주민세' WHEN COMMI='POSI_BREAK' THEN '절사금' WHEN COMMI='RESULT' THEN '환급금' ELSE '2.제세금' END COMMI_NM, -- 제세금 이름 C_TOTAL C_TOT, -- 전체 C_001 C_001, -- 운영본부 C_002 C_002, -- 창원 C_004 C_004, -- 부산 C_YEAR_TOT -- 전체누계 FROM ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_2' COMMI, SUM(P.COMMI_2) C_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.COMMI_2 END ) C_001, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN P.COMMI_2 END ) C_002, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN P.COMMI_2 END ) C_004, SUM(S.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P, ( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_2) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , VW_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 0:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 1:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 2:MEET_CD:'001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD ) S WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 3:RACE_DAY'20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD UNION ALL SELECT P.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_3' COMMI, SUM(P.COMMI_3) C_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.COMMI_3 END ) C_001, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN P.COMMI_3 END ) C_002, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN P.COMMI_3 END ) C_004, SUM(S.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P, ( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_3) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , VW_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 5:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 6:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 7:MEET_CD '001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD ) S WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 8:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 9:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD UNION ALL SELECT P.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_4' COMMI, SUM(P.COMMI_4) C_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.COMMI_4 END ) C_001, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN P.COMMI_4 END ) C_002, SUM(CASE WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN P.COMMI_4 END ) C_004, SUM(S.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P, ( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_4) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , VW_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 10:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 11:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 12:MEET_CD '001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD ) S WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 13:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 14:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD UNION ALL -- 기타소득세 SELECT T1.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_5' COMMI, SUM(T1.COMMI) C_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_001, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD='02' THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_002, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD='04' THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_004, SUM(T2.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, P.COMMI_5 COMMI, P.SELL_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 15:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 16:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT S.MEET_CD, S.COMMI_5 COMMI, S.SELL_CD FROM PC_GITA S WHERE 1=1 AND S.JIGEUP_DT = ? -- 17:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND S.MEET_CD = ? -- 18:MEET_CD '001' ) T1, ( SELECT SUM(C_YEAR_TOT) C_YEAR_TOT FROM ( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_5) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , VW_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 19:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 20:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 21:MEET_CD '001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_5) C_YEAR_TOT FROM PC_GITA S WHERE 1=1 AND S.JIGEUP_DT <= ? -- 22:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND S.MEET_CD = ? -- 23:MEET_CD '001' ) ) T2 GROUP BY MEET_CD UNION ALL -- 주민세 SELECT T1.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_6' COMMI, SUM(T1.COMMI) C_TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_001, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD='02' THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_002, SUM(CASE WHEN T1.SELL_CD='04' THEN T1.COMMI END ) C_004, SUM(T2.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM ( SELECT P.MEET_CD, P.COMMI_6 COMMI, P.SELL_CD FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, VW_PC_PAYOFFS P WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 24:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 25:MEET_CD '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT S.MEET_CD, S.COMMI_6 COMMI, S.SELL_CD FROM PC_GITA S WHERE 1=1 AND S.JIGEUP_DT = ? -- 26:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND S.MEET_CD = ? -- 27:MEET_CD '001' ) T1, ( SELECT SUM(C_YEAR_TOT) C_YEAR_TOT FROM ( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_6) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , VW_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 28:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 29:RACE_DAY '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 30:MEET_CD '001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD UNION ALL SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_6) C_YEAR_TOT FROM PC_GITA S WHERE 1=1 AND S.JIGEUP_DT <= ? -- 31:RACE_DAY :'20110115' AND S.MEET_CD = ? -- 32:MEET_CD '001' ) ) T2 GROUP BY MEET_CD
)A,(SELECT LEVEL LEV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=2)B )C )D GROUP BY D.LEV,D.MEET_CD,D.COMMI,COMMI_NM ORDER BY LEV DESC

SELECT /* rsm4011_s04 */ MEET_CD, -- 경륜 경주 구분 코드 COMMI, -- 수익금 코드 COMMI_NM, -- 수익금 명 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',SUM(C_TOT),SUM(C_TOT)) AS C_TOT, -- 전체 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',SUM(C_001),SUM(C_001)) AS C_001, -- 운영본부 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',SUM(C_002),SUM(C_002)) AS C_002, -- 창원 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',SUM(C_004),SUM(C_004)) AS C_004, -- 부산 DECODE(C.LEV,'1',SUM(C_YEAR_TOT),SUM(C_YEAR_TOT)) AS C_YEAR_TOT -- 전체 누계
FROM ( SELECT MEET_CD, DECODE(B.LEV,'1',COMMI,'') AS COMMI, DECODE(B.LEV,'1',COMMI_NM,'3.수익금') AS COMMI_NM, C_TOT, C_001, C_002, C_004, C_YEAR_TOT, B.LEV FROM( SELECT MEET_CD,
DECODE(COMMI,NULL,'TOTAL',COMMI) COMMI, CASE WHEN COMMI='COMMI_1' THEN '수득금' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_2' THEN '경주세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_3' THEN '교육세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_4' THEN '농특세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_5' THEN '기타소득세' WHEN COMMI='COMMI_6' THEN '주민세' WHEN COMMI='POSI_BREAK' THEN '절사금' WHEN COMMI='RESULT' THEN '환급금' ELSE '3.수익금' END COMMI_NM, C_TOTAL C_TOT, C_001 C_001, C_002 C_002, C_004 C_004, C_YEAR_TOT FROM (
-- 수득금 SELECT P.MEET_CD, 'COMMI_1' COMMI, SUM(P.COMMI_1) C_TOTAL, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.COMMI_1 END ) C_001, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN P.COMMI_1 END ) C_002, SUM( CASE WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN P.COMMI_1 END ) C_004, SUM(S.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, --VW_PC_PAYOFFS P, TBJI_PC_PAYOFFS P,
( SELECT SUM(S.COMMI_1) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , --VW_PC_PAYOFFS S TBJI_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 0:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 1:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 2:MEET_CD 경주 구분 코드 AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD ) S WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 3:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 4:MEET_CD 경주 구분 코드 '001' AND P.MEET_CD =V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD UNION ALL
-- 절사금 SELECT P.MEET_CD, 'POSI_BREAK' COMMI, --SUM(P.POSI_BREAK-P.NEGA_BREAK) C_TOTAL, SUM((P.NET_AMT - P.COMMI_2 - P.COMMI_3 - P.COMMI_4 - P.COMMI_1) - NVL(P.PAY_AMT,0)) C_TOTAL, SUM( CASE --WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN P.POSI_BREAK-P.NEGA_BREAK WHEN SELL_CD IN('01','03') THEN (P.NET_AMT - P.COMMI_2 - P.COMMI_3 - P.COMMI_4 - P.COMMI_1) - NVL(P.PAY_AMT,0) END ) C_001, SUM( CASE --WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN P.POSI_BREAK-P.NEGA_BREAK WHEN SELL_CD='02' THEN (P.NET_AMT - P.COMMI_2 - P.COMMI_3 - P.COMMI_4 - P.COMMI_1) - NVL(P.PAY_AMT,0) END ) C_002, SUM( CASE --WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN P.POSI_BREAK-P.NEGA_BREAK WHEN SELL_CD='04' THEN (P.NET_AMT - P.COMMI_2 - P.COMMI_3 - P.COMMI_4 - P.COMMI_1) - NVL(P.PAY_AMT,0) END ) C_004, SUM(S.C_YEAR_TOT)/COUNT(*) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO V, --VW_PC_PAYOFFS P, TBJI_PC_PAYOFFS P, ( SELECT --SUM(S.POSI_BREAK-S.NEGA_BREAK) C_YEAR_TOT SUM((S.NET_AMT - S.COMMI_2 - S.COMMI_3 - S.COMMI_4 - S.COMMI_1) - NVL(S.PAY_AMT,0)) C_YEAR_TOT FROM VW_SDL_INFO T , --VW_PC_PAYOFFS S TBJI_PC_PAYOFFS S WHERE 1=1 AND T.RACE_DAY <= ? -- 5:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND T.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?,1,4) -- 6:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND T.MEET_CD = ? -- 7:MEET_CD 경주 구분 코드 '001' AND S.MEET_CD=T.MEET_CD AND S.STND_YEAR=T.STND_YEAR AND S.TMS=T.TMS AND S.DAY_ORD=T.DAY_ORD ) S WHERE 1=1 AND V.RACE_DAY = ? -- 8:RACE_DAY 경주일 '20110115' AND V.MEET_CD = ? -- 9:MEET_CD 경주 구분 코드 '001' AND P.MEET_CD=V.MEET_CD AND P.STND_YEAR=V.STND_YEAR AND P.TMS=V.TMS AND P.DAY_ORD=V.DAY_ORD GROUP BY P.MEET_CD ) )A,(SELECT LEVEL LEV FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <=2) B -- 레코드 합계용 )C GROUP BY LEV, MEET_CD, COMMI, COMMI_NM ORDER BY LEV DESC
